affiliation.ce:source-text: International Christian University, Mitaka, Tokyo, Japan

head.abstracts: Â© 2023, The Author(s), under exclusive license to Springer Nature Switzerland AG.This short chapter surveys five papers containing a variety of quaternionic moment applications in fields like color image watermarking, image representation and recognition, bio-signal watermarking, and quaternionic fractional-order pseudo-Jacobi Fourier moments.

affiliation.ce:source-text: International Christian University, Mitaka, Tokyo, Japan

publisher.publishername: Springer Science and Business Media Deutschland GmbH

coredata.dc:description: This short chapter surveys five papers containing a variety of quaternionic moment applications in fields like color image watermarking, image representation and recognition, bio-signal watermarking, and quaternionic fractional-order pseudo-Jacobi Fourier moments.
coredata.dc:title: Quaternionic Moments
